title: Wag the Dog (1997) Dustin Hoffman+Robert DeNiro (OPT.NORDSUBS)
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0120885/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0120885/</a>

Optional subtitles in separate idx/sub files:
Danish, Finnish, Norwegian, Swedish
(Sorry, international friends, the DVD had only these subs.)


Directed by Barry Levinson
With Anne Heche, Denis Leary and Woody Harrelson

Brilliant satire: A spin-doctor and a Hollywood producer join efforts to "fabricate" a war in order to cover up a presidential sex scandal.

Widescreen XviD 2-pass 720x400, good stereo AC3.
Burn tested, runs well in both my standalone DivX players.
